capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is affiliated with Hogwarts, that's confirmed. I've always found it interesting how the staff at Hogwarts are so dedicated to their work, and Flitwick being a great example of that. He's definitely one of the most enthusiastic professors I've had the pleasure of learning from.

I'm not really sure what Flitwick's affiliation with Hogwarts is, to be honest. I've heard he's a bit of an old-fashioned teacher, but I don't know if that's related to his role as the Charms master or something else entirely.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and it seems like he has a very free-spirited nature. He's got this "no-rules" approach to life that can be both refreshing and chaotic at the same time. I think that's part of what makes him so interesting, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of personality does dudley have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's personality is often described as selfish. I've noticed that about him myself. He can come across as quite self-centered at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of someone being described as selfish before, valeria, can you tell me more about what that means to you?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he seems like a pretty self-centered person.
